start.speaker: THE_LEADER
start.text: You shouldn't be here. No one comes to Ashfall unless they're lost or lying.

Her hand hasn't moved from her belt. She's ready for this to go wrong.

choices.text: I'm neither. I'm looking for answers.
[LIE] I got separated from my group. Just need shelter for the night.
[EMPATHY] You look like you haven't slept in days. What's wrong?

direct_approach.speaker: THE_LEADER
direct_approach.text: Answers. Everyone wants answers. But the only thing Ashfall has is questions and dust.

lie_approach_success.speaker: THE_LEADER
lie_approach_success.text: ...Fine. One night. But you stay where I can see you.

memory.content: You lied to get in. She might not know yet.

lie_approach_failure.speaker: THE_LEADER
lie_approach_failure.text: You're a terrible liar. Which means you're either desperate or stupid. Which is it?

interruptions.text: You used to be better at this. Before. What happened to you?
